definitions.definition: A slender wax candle; a small lighted wax candle
A tapering form; gradual diminution of thickness and/or cross section in an elongated object
definitions.example: The legs of the table had a slight taper to them.

definitions.definition: A thin stick used for lighting candles, either a wax-coated wick or a slow-burning wooden rod.
One who operates a tape machine.
Someone who works with tape or tapes.
